doc.previous: A more sophisticated example is the following Consider the unit circle which is described by the ordinary Cartesian equation
doc.after: This equation can be parameterized as follows  With the Cartesian equation it is easier to check whether a point lies on the circle or not With the parametric version it is easier to obtain points on a plot
